title: Creative Linens Battenburg Lace Wedding Bridal Fan Beige
features: This hand-held decorative folding fan measures approximately 11 inches (27 cm) from top to bottom, about 19 inches (48 cm) wide when fully opened.
This exquisitely hand crafted battenburg lace fan with bamboo stem is full of battenburg lace on the front and is lined with polyester from the back.
Matching Battenburg Lace Fans in different colors (Black or White), Battenburg Lace kitchen window curtains, placemats, table runners and table toppers available under separate listings.

It can be used for weddings, plays and film, at any Victorian themed events, civil war reenactments, ladies’ tea parties, celebrations, social gatherings, holiday decorations, any special occasions and everyday use.
